channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Graffiti on rear access to Asda, 4th May
item.description:
On the steps leading up to the rear of Asda from the public footpath from North Road East, the hoardings against the undeveloped Pure Offices property have been sprayed with graffiti.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 11, Tylea Close, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffiti on North Road East to Asda Footpath, 4th May
item.description:
About half way along the footpath connecting North Road East and the rear of the Asda store, there is some racist graffiti sprayed onto a concrete block wall.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 12, Tylea Close, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Extensive Graffiti Arle Court Underpass, 4th May
item.description:
The majority of the Arle court pedestrian/cycle underpass on the A40 is covered in graffiti and could do with cleaning please.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A40, Hatherley, Cheltenham

item.title: 3 potholes still NOT fixed, 4th May
item.description:
The three potholes that I reported on Thursday on the motorway bridge on Lobleys drive have NOT been fixed. I received a notification yesterday that they had been. There are THREE (3) potholes not one. They are becoming dangerous as cars are having to move further in to the opposite carriageway to avoid!!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lobleys Drive, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Huge pothole and cracked carriageway, 4th May
item.description:
Huge pothole and getting bigger with carriageway falling apart
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Berkeley Place, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Missing paving slabs, lifted by the tree roots or teenagers, 4th May
item.description:
Lifted , missing paving slabs outside the house wall of end of terrace 5 Union Street, Cheltenham, GL522JN. The problem has been out there for the last 18 months but got really worse in the last few months . In addition to lifted up by the tree roots ,loose paving slabs, it also became Anti-social meeting place to have a drink, smoke various things that lead to those slabs thrown against the tree, our house wall as well onto the busy road. Please help to make it safe again. It's very upsetting and concerning in terms of our safety. Many thanks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5, Union Street, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Traffic light not working, 4th May
item.description:
Traffic light at pedestrian crossing next to Brizen Park not working at all
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Up Hatherley Way, Warden Hill, Cheltenham

item.category: Green or amber traffic light is not working

item.title: Blocked drain, 4th May
item.description:
The drain here is blocked with heavy surface water. It's located approximately outside 34-38 Imperial Square.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Imperial Square, Montpellier, Cheltenham

item.title: Blocked drain, 4th May
item.description:
This is an example of several of the blocked drains observed along London Road. To be fair the entire section of London Road between the crossroads of College Road/Hewlett Road up to the crossing at Hales Road needs to be looked at as many drains are blocked and the drainage gullies are full of leave litter composting as well as plants taking root.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): London Road, Tivoli, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain blocked, 4th May
item.description:
The drain in front of the bus stop is blocked with surface water after light rain. To be fair the entire section of London Road between the crossroads of College Road/Hewlett Road up to the crossing at Hales Road needs to be looked at as many drains are blocked and the drainage gullies are full of leave litter composting as well as plants taking root.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): London Road, Tivoli, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drains are blocked, 3rd May
item.description:
The drains from 24 Feddon close up the road towards 26 are blocked. Full of leaves and silt. The rain drains down to my house and eventually will cause flooding. Been here 8 years since new build and I’ve never seen them cleared. We live in the Brook with all the leaves from the trees. Please can these be unblocked.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 26, Feddon Close, Stoke Orchard, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: At least three pot holes where road dips down, uSudeley Castle, visitors to Sudeley Castle use this road / dangerous for low profile tyres and problem getting worse., 3rd May
item.description:
Rushley Lane half way down where Cotswold walking signs are, dip in road past private cottage.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rushley Lane, Winchcombe, Tewkesbury

item.title: Blocked drain opposite Golden Miller footpath, 3rd May
item.description:
I reported this some weeks ago, received an email the matter had been resolved but alas as you can see either I was duped or your department was duped. Please resolve this issue.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Swindon Lane, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Midwinter Avenue GL51 9JF Street lights, 3rd May
item.description:
The streetlight, no. 1 ; along with all of the other streetlights in Midwinter Avenue GL51 9JF have failed again. This is happening frequently now ( several times time in recent months) . Can you please repair ASAP. There are several disabled residents in this area and it is pitch-black at night.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 15, Midwinter Avenue, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brockworth Bypass, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
